div.p: Model results. ( a) Modelled sum of TDD in 0.4 m depth at the five key sites under current climatic conditions (squares), RCP 4.5 (circles) and RCP 8.5 (triangles). ( b) Percentage loss from 2017–2100 under RCP 4.5 (blue) and RCP 8.5 (red) of the slow OC pool containing the archaeological OC fraction.
